org.epics.ioc.pdrv
Interface Trace

public interface Trace

Interface for tracing pdrv requests.

Author:
mrk

Field Summary
static int DRIVER
          A port or device driver message.
static int ERROR
          An error message.
static int FLOW
          A flow of control message.
static int IO_ASCII
          printIO requests will print data in ascii.
static int IO_ESCAPE
          printIO request will print data in ascii but control characters will be printed as escape sequences.
static int IO_HEX
          printIO will display data as hex.
static int IO_NODATA
          printIO requests will not print data.
static int SUPPORT
          A support message.

Method Detail

setMask

void setMask(int mask)
Set the traceMask.

Parameters:
mask - The mask. It must be some combination of ERROR|SUPPORT|DRIVER

getMask

int getMask()
Get the trace mask.

Returns:
The mask.

setIOMask

void setIOMask(int mask)
Set the IO trace mask.

Parameters:
mask - The mask. It must be some combination of IO_NODATA|IO_ASCII|IO_ESCAPE|IO_HEX

Get the IO trace mask.

The mask.

setIOTruncateSize

void setIOTruncateSize(int size)
Set the size for truncating data output for printIO requests.

Parameters:
size - The size in bytes.

getIOTruncateSize

int getIOTruncateSize()
Get the size for truncating data output for printIO requests.

Returns:
The size in bytes.

optionChangeListenerAdd

Status optionChangeListenerAdd(User user,
                               TraceOptionChangeListener traceOptionChangeListener)
Add a listener for put of any trace option.

Parameters:
user - The user.
traceOptionChangeListener - The listener.
Returns:
Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage() describes why the request failed.

optionChangeListenerRemove

void optionChangeListenerRemove(User user)
Remove a listener for put of any trace option.

Parameters:
user - The user.

print

void print(int reason,
           java.lang.String message)
Generate a trace message.

Parameters:
reason - One of ERROR|SUPPORT|DRIVER|FLOW.
message - The message to print

print

void print(int reason,
           java.lang.String format,
           java.lang.Object... args)
Generate a trace message.

Parameters:
reason - One of ERROR|SUPPORT|DRIVER|FLOW.
format - A format.
args - The data associated with the format.

printIO

void printIO(int reason,
             byte[] buffer,
             long length,
             java.lang.String message)
Generate a trace message and also show data values.

Parameters:
reason - One of ERROR|SUPPORT|DRIVER|FLOW.
buffer - The data array.
length - The number of data items.
message - The message to print.

printIO

void printIO(int reason,
             byte[] buffer,
             long length,
             java.lang.String format,
             java.lang.Object... args)
Generate a trace message and also show data values.

Parameters:
reason - One of ERROR|SUPPORT|DRIVER|FLOW.
buffer - The data array.
length - The number of data items.
format - A format.
args - The data associated with the format.
